-- | An executable and library to determine if a file is a DICOM file
--   
@package isdicom
@version 0.0.2

module System.FilePath.Dicom
isDicomFile :: FilePath -> IO Bool
dicomFileR :: FilePath -> IO FileR
dicomExitCodeFileR :: FilePath -> IO ExitCode
exitCodeFileR :: FileR -> ExitCode
data FileR
IsNotDicom :: FileR
DoesNotExist :: FileR
IsNotReadable :: FileR
IsDirectory :: FileR
IsDicom :: FileR
instance Eq FileR
instance Show FileR
instance Ord FileR
